channel.title: A blog about business intelligence, data, programming and DevOps

item.title: Authors
item.description: Maxim Deviatov Current occupation: Head and founder of IDEA company. Software developer. Experience in IT since 1995. Area of interest Currently interested in data analysis, the use of analytics in business. I participate in projects as a manager, consultant and developer. Extensive experience in the field of real estate, medicine, customer service. Platform used: Qlik, Airflow, data sources: SQL, REST, cloud services. Business automation outsourcing Development in Python3: data processing, document generation and processing, WorkFlow automation, DevOps Work experience, skills and abilities Development Qlik Developer (since 2017) Node.
